data.target_sentence: In the case of a solution of dextran MNP, the magnetic resistance value, magnetic resistance ratio, and solution bearing force are 1.432 M, 0.2%, and 260Oe, respectively, depending on the external magnetic field, indicating stable magnetic resistance curves in the form of butterfly wings.
data.label: CHOSEN

data.source_sentence: 결과는 용액 안에서 서로 다른 면역치료용 항체가 MNPs의 표면에 붙어 있으며 자기장에 따라 표적으로 유도하는데 조절이 가능할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The result is that different immunotherapeutic antibodies are attached to the surface of MNPs in solution, and it may be possible to control the induction of the target according to the magnetic field.
data.target_sentence: The results show that different antibodies for immunotherapy are attached to the surface of MNPs in the solution and can be adjusted to guide them to the target depending on the magnetic field.
data.label: UNCHOSEN

data.source_sentence: 결과는 용액 안에서 서로 다른 면역치료용 항체가 MNPs의 표면에 붙어 있으며 자기장에 따라 표적으로 유도하는데 조절이 가능할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The results show that different antibodies for immunotherapy are attached to the surface of MNPs in the solution and can be adjusted to guide them to the target depending on the magnetic field.
data.target_sentence: The results show that different antibodies for immunotherapy are attached to the surface of MNPs in the solution and can be adjusted to guide them to the target depending on the magnetic field.
data.label: BEST
